A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t know why people are saying this Movie was bad. I’ve been a Star Wars fan my entire life\, and I loved this movie. It was great. A few scenes were eh but I was pleasantly surprised with how much I enjoy it. It was not predictable. Much than The Force Awakens\, in my opinion. Don’t let the bad reviews stop you from seeing it. My VERY CRITICAL (especially with movies) fiancé loved it and he hated TFA... so... give it a chance! Well done\, Director Rian Johnson.
